name: Parallel Robots
description:
Use the arrow keys to guide two different robots at the same time in this puzzle game! Both robots must be on the portals at the same time to advance, and use r to restart a level. This game was made for the Pixel Art Game Jam with the theme Parallel Worlds. It was made in about 6 hours over only one day. Everything except the font was made by me, including art, code and music. 

Art: Procreate

Game Engine: Godot

Music: Beepbox
